name: AVAudioSessionChannelDescription
desc: A class that describes a hardware channel on the current device.

items.name: var channelName: String
items.desc: The descriptive name for the channel.

items.name: var channelNumber: Int
items.desc: The index of this channel in its owning port’s array of channels.

items.name: var owningPortUID: String
items.desc: The unique identifier (UID) for this channel’s owning port.

items.name: var channelLabel: AudioChannelLabel
items.desc: A description of the physical location of this channel.
